      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_271</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_271</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">La función cuadrática. La parábola</string>
            <string language="en">Quadratic functions. Parabola curves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quadratische Funktionen. Parabelkurven</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonctions quadratiques. Courbes de 
parabole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Funções quadráticas. Curvas da 
parábola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzioni quadratiche. Curve di parabola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δευτέρου βαθμού λειτουργίες. Καμπύλες παραβολής</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la función cuadrática. Se comienza el estudio a partir de la parábola y=x^2 centrada en el origen y, mediante transformaciones, se van obteniendo otros casos.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain quadratic functions, beginning with the study of the parabola y=x^2 centred at the origin and obtaining other parabolas by means of transformations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">vértice</string>
            <string language="en">vertex</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cuadrática</string>
            <string language="en">quadratic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">simetría</string>
            <string language="en">symmetry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">parábola</string>
            <string language="en">parabola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die quadratischen Funktionen, fangend mit der Studie der
Parabel y=x^2 zu erklären zentriert am Ursprung und am Erhalten 
anderer Parabeln mittels der Transformationen an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer des fonctions quadratiques, commençant par 
l'étude de la parabole y=x^2 centrée à l'origine et à obtenir 
d'autres paraboles au moyen de transformations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
as funções quadráticas, começando com o estudo da parábola y=x^2 
centrada na origem e em obter outras parábolas por meio das 
transformações.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare le funzioni quadratiche, comincianti con lo studio sulla 
parabola y=x^2 concentrata all'origine e ad ottenere altre parabole 
per mezzo di trasformazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει τις δευτέρου βαθμού λειτουργίες, αρχίζοντας με τη
μελέτη της παραβολής y=x^2 που κεντροθετείται στην προέλευση 
και λήψη άλλων παραβολών με τη βοήθεια των μετασχηματισμών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gipfel</string>
